23.13. [Haimo] HAI Glosses (Glosae Veteris ac Noui Testamenti).
Glosses | Old and New Testament
Manuscripts:
1. Bern, Burgerbibliothek 258, f. 16va-47vb . saec. ix-x. O: Fleury/Auxerre?; P: Daniel. Interpolated with Johannes Scottus Eriugena, Glossae Divinae Historiae.
2. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 1977 (Col. 4321; Reg. 4003.2.2.a), f. 63r-83v. saec. xii ex.- xiii inc. Interpolated with Johannes Scottus Eriugena, Glossa Divinae Historiae.
3. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 4883A (Col. 1248; Reg. 3807.4), f. 7ra-19rb.. saec. x ex.-xi inc.; P: Limoges, St. Martial. Interpolated with Johannes Scottus Eriugena, Glossae Divinae Historiae.
4. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Reg. Lat. 215, f. 88r-106r. Fleury or Tours? saec. ix. Interpolated with Johannes Scottus Eriugena, Glossa Divinae Historiae. *
Bibliography:
1. John J. Contreni, "The Biblical Glosses of Haimo of Auxerre and John Scottus Eriugena," Speculum 51 (1976), 411-434.
